title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-7.2 - Procedures and engineering controls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-7.2 - Procedures and engineering controls

State Regulations

The permittee must use, to the extent practicable, procedures and engineering controls based upon sound radiation protection
principles to achieve doses to members of the public that are
ALARA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-7.2

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
